message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more to end this quickly.
Your offer was a bit too greedy Alice. Let's settle this fairly. I'm taking a bit more than last time since the value is going down for both of us.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. I'll stick to my initial offer - it's the fastest way to end this.
Alice, this is ridiculous.  The longer we wait, the less we both get.  Let's split it evenly and call it a day.
